title: Ahri's new 8.8 Patch (Not 8.5)
body:
Re posted due to incorrectly naming the patch notes.

https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/general-discussion/B4BlBJ52-i-got-so-upset?comment=0002

I don't suppose any one else is upset with this as much as I am. In fact, I'm completely heart broken.

She may as well be a rock in the road, now. Why not just add a few balls and chains to weigh her down more?

Ahri takes so much perfect perception and timing. In return favoring you the possibility to not just go in to die. Now? Here, we buffed your stuffed but removed your ability to evade incoming attacks. HAVE FUN.

NOT LIKE YOU NEED AN AOE SELF DEFENSE FORM OF PROTECTION WITH CC/ATTACK THAT YOU CAN HIT A TARGET WITH BY CLICKING ON THEM OR THAT CAN GO RIGHT THROUGH MINIONS
{{champion:84}} {{champion:34}} {{champion:1}} {{champion:136}} {{champion:63}} {{champion:245}} {{champion:9}} {{champion:105}} {{champion:74}} {{champion:30}} {{champion:38}} {{champion:55}} {{champion:85}} {{champion:7}} {{champion:127}} {{champion:99}} {{champion:90}} {{champion:61}} {{champion:13}} {{champion:134}} {{champion:163}} {{champion:91}} {{champion:4}} {{champion:45}} {{champion:161}} {{champion:112}} .{{champion:8}} {{champion:101}} {{champion:157}} {{champion:115}} {{champion:142}} 

AND THEN THERE'S JUST {{champion:103}} Q and E only goes in one direction. Only Q can go through minions/monsters. You can't target them at any one or pick an AOE location. W just pray and sprays where ever it wants to. R is just a copy of W with a wall hop distance x3 which can only be done WHEN ULTING. SO YEAH LETS JUST REMOVE "Not So Fast" FROM AHRI!

Great game.


RIP Ahri December 14th, 2011 - April 18th, 2018. "Speed of light? No problem."

A good ahri knows also, that using charm as a combo start, is only the case in early game, this finally allows her to be able 1v1 most match ups again, which she couldn't do before because of all the dmg nerfs. Mid/late game it doesn't matter most of the time if u start with charm or not on adc's supports

Q was great for fleeing. I used it well. Or even getting around minions. Its too late though. I already refunded her and picked something else out. There's no way I can play her any more. Not in the way I do.
Meanwhile all the people that actually play her agree it is a big buff.

> [{quoted}](name=MagicFlyingLlama,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=0JQAWB7q,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-04-22T02:44:45.676+0000)
>
> Meanwhile all the people that actually play her agree it is a big buff.

Dont see anyone saying that? Her WR went down by 1~2%.
That's because it's a pretty big change, and people still need to get used to it.

Because a bunch of bads are trying out the rework.

It happens for any rework and is usually a lot bigger.

She has more damage now due to amplification on her charm.

Before season 5, she was this way. She didn't need the MS on Q back then. Now, she still gets 20% MS if she hits 2 abilities (both sides of Q alone will activate her passive), which means she still has some MS for an escape. So she's safer than early season 5, but has the damage back. That sounds good to me, as a long-term Ahri player.
